overview:
Jason Thibeault defines marketing and technology strategy for public high-tech companies.

Jason played a central role in Limelight Network’s market pivot from the CDN market to the Digital Presence Management market. Jason was responsible for developing the core concepts of Digital Presence Management and defining Limelight’s primary offering, Orchestrate (a Digital Presence Platform). Jason was instrumental in developing Limelight Networks as a thought-leader in the Digital Presence Management space.

As a product manager/product developer, Jason has created innovative mobile solutions including the technology behind GoWare as well as industry-leading solutions, like Limelight Stream Anywhere, for the digital media space.

Jason is an experienced technology and marketing executive. Having founded several startups including GoWare and jdpower.com, Jason has filled a variety of roles including CIO, CTO, and CEO.

Jason frequently meets with analysts and press and speaks around the world at industry-related events.

Jason is also currently the Founder/Creative Director for Dime Novel Publishing, an Indie publishing press focused on Young Adult/Middle Reader series. He is the author of the Marmalade series (available in many leading e-book stores) and the upcoming Dem0n series.
